title: Lease amendment with the Port Authority

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 222 INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN DIONNE FLOWERS    An ordinance recommended by the Port Authority Commission of the City of St. Louis authorizing and directing the Mayor and the Comptroller of the City of St. Louis to enter into a lease amendment (hereinafter ?Lease Amendment? and attached as Exhibit 1) by and between the City of St. Louis, a Municipal Corporation of the State of Missouri (hereinafter called ?Lessor?), through its Mayor and Comptroller, and ACL Transportation Services LLC, (hereinafter called ?Lessee?).
